var metricsName = "DesktopCredibleBadgesInTopReviewsDetailPageCount" if(window.ue) { ue.count(metricsName, 0) } proctor1645.0 out of 5 stars It's a quality appliance Reviewed in Canada on October 10, 2024Colour Name: Dark GrayVerified Purchase I've had the previous style with the removable basket for years now...and I'm very happy with the removable basket style, so was nervous to go to this tray version. After a soured experience with another new airfryer major brand/model (2000 series to be nonspecific)...I decided to try this Cosori. I love it! And don't miss the window, which is overrated imho! The Cosori Turboblaze is very premium in design, feel, features, and weight. While you cannot directly set the fan speed...it does have good settings that varies the (DC) fan speed. It's quiet, no vibrations or rattles...and the beeps are very much tolerable and soft sounding. Cooking performance is the same as any similar sized (wattage) air fryer...I don't think there is much difference really...it's a fan with a heating element. The differences do come in with quality of construction, materials, and user interface...all of which affects the price of course. All in all I don't think you can go wrong with this Cosori model...the basket is 9.25 inches square, and the tray looks to be easy to clean (I use a liner anyways). My nit picks on this model would be the lack of a power cord clip...and it doesn't have the built in notches on the bottom for you hands when you pick it up. Otherwise..first rate quality machine! description: COSORI TurboBlaze 6.0-Quart Air FryerUpgrade your cooking game with our revolutional Air Fryer, and enjoy faster cooking times, versatile functionality, and exceptional results. With its compact size and large capacity, this is the ultimate kitchen companion for the health concious family. Try it now and transform the way you cook!Specifications:Model: CAF-DC601-KCAPower Supply: DC 120V, 60HzRated Power: 1,725WCapacity: 6 qt /5.7 L (serves 3-5 people)Temperature Range: 90Â°-450Â°F/ 30Â°-230Â°CTime Range: 1 min-24 hrDimensions: 11.8 x 14.4 x 11.9 in (including handle)Weight: 13.2 lb /6 kgTest Run:In order to make sure the air fryer is working correctly and remove potential odors from the manufacturing process, please follow the instructions in the manual for the Test Run before cooking with your air fryer.
